title: Linux 6.17 release   Main changes, Arm, RISC-V, and MIPS architectures
summary: Linux 6.17 has just been released on LKML: No huge surprises this past week, so here we are, with kernel 6.17 pushed out and ready to go. Below is the shortlog for just the last week not the full 6.17 release as usual. It s not exciting, which is all good.
